account.title1: Can I use my friend's Trade Offer URL?
account.content1: Due to security reasons you can save only your current account's STEAM trade offer URL.
account.title2: How do I save my STEAM Trade URL?
account.content2: Copy it from here and save it in your {{siteName}} account page.
account.title3: Why my nickname and avatar on STEAM are different than on {{siteName}}?
account.content3: Please logout and login again and wait some time until our site update your data.
account.title4: Where can I find my {{siteName}} ID?
account.content4: Your {{siteName}} ID can be found at profile page.
account.title5: Why my account is banned on {{siteName}}?
account.content5: There might be several reasons. In most cases the reason is a violation of site rules and/or terms of conditions. Also {{siteName}} account could be banned in case suspicious activity is detected or bad attitude to other players or in the conversation with a support team. Please be patient and do not violate any of the points mentioned above.

bonuses.content1: Pay attention to our <Link>partner program</Link>. Invite people and get a percentage of their deposits. Your earnings are unlimited!

deposit.content1: Go to the top header and click the deposit button. For mobile, click button in the bottom toolbar.
deposit.title2: How much is a minimum deposit?
deposit.content2: The minimum deposit depends on payment method.
deposit.content3: Please wait 5-10 minutes. If payment still not arrived please contact relevant department and mention your id which you've used for payment.

withdrawal.content1:
• Go to the Inventory.
  • Select the item you want to withdraw.
  • Click the top withdraw button.
withdrawal.title2: I see an error when I'm trying to withdraw CS2 item
withdrawal.content2: Not all CS2 items can be withdrawn. You can recycle items that fail to withdraw, and their value will be added to your shop balance.

website.title1: Why I can not log in to {{siteName}} through STEAM and it showing error message?
website.content1: If your account banned on STEAM you won't be able to log in to {{siteName}}. Please use unrestricted STEAM account.

partnership.title1: Does the user remain a referral of the partner forever?
partnership.content1: No. The user can change the parent via parent‘s link or referral code. A user's referral partner will change as the referrer changes the referral code (referral link).
partnership.content2: A user who followed partner's link or applied promo code becomes your referral. The referral belongs to the partner, whose reference he'd used the last time before filling the balance.
partnership.title3: I've sent a link to many people. They've used it however I haven't received my bonus.
partnership.content3: Please double check with your user that he is using your promo code. If he applied promo code of another user you won't receive partner bonus.
partnership.title4: How can you increase your percentage of profits from partners?
partnership.content4: We keep track of active users and improve the percentage. More users - more percentage.
partnership.title5: What is a RSkins partner program about?
partnership.content5: As a RSkins partner you get your referral link and your promo code. You earn % of your referrals' deposits on RSkins.
partnership.title6: How much can I earn as a partner?
partnership.content6:
You start with 1% on Level 1 and rise up to 5% at Level 5. Your level and profit depend on the total amount of your referrals' deposits on RSkins. Your partner percent increases automatically with the deposits amount rising. The more referrals you have, the higher % and profit you get. Share your referral link via social media, promote it on your website, Youtube or Twitch to invite more people and get more profit. 
1 level: $0 = 1% 
2 level: $1,000 = 2% 
3 level: $5,000 = 3% 
4 level: $25,000 = 4% 
5 level: $50,000 = 5%
partnership.title7: When do I get the partner money?
partnership.content7: You get money onto your partner balance every time your referrals deposit on RSkins.com. Partner balance can be used to get skins you've chosen or it can be transferred to your main balance to play on the site.
partnership.title8: What is the promo code for?
partnership.content8: Partner promo code, same as referral link, gives +5% bonus to your referrals for every deposit.
partnership.title9: What will my promo code look like?
partnership.content9:
Automatically, you get a unique number as promo code, but you can change it whenever you want for any combination that is vacant. Your new promo code should contain only Latin alphabet letters, numbers 0-9. 
Note, that RSkins may reset your promo code if it's being already promoted by someone else or for other reasons.
partnership.title10: Does the user remain a referral of the first partner forever?
partnership.content10: Users can change the referral relationship by modifying the referrer code.
partnership.content11: A user who followed a partner link or used a promo code. A referral belongs to the partner, whose promo code or partner link he/she used prior to filling the balance.
partnership.title12: I gave my referral link to many people, but I didn't receive the partner money. What's wrong?
partnership.content12: There are two possible reasons: Your referrals followed your link but didn't fill their balance on the site. Your referrals used a partner link/promo code of another partner just before making the deposit.
partnership.title13: Where can I promote my code?
partnership.content13:
You can promote your partner code on other sites and in social media. You can not advertise it in search networks. It should be clear for people that they use the referral link/code of the certain partner. 
It is forbidden to use browser extensions (like Honey, CouponBirds etc.) for advertising your promo code.
partnership.title14: What restrictions does the partner system have?
partnership.content14:
The only aim of the RSkins Partner system is to attract new players to the site by promoting partners' promo codes and links. This is what our partners get rewarded for. It goes without saying that we do not tolerate any kind of abusing our Partner & Bonus system (including using multiple accounts or offering users any payment for using your affiliate code, or giving cashback in any form for deposits with a particular code, and so forth). According to our Terms & Conditions, the accounts suspected of such abuse will be blocked immediately and without prior notice. 
Note that we pay partner money for real promotion, not for taking short & easy codes (e.g. numbers, letters, RSkins related words/phrases and so forth) which will be used without any efforts on the part of their owners. We may restrict such accounts at our own discretion. 
It is also forbidden to use the codes that closely resonate with the famous influencers' codes (e.g. misplaced symbols, extra symbols, typos-like symbols, etc). Users with such promo codes violate the rules of our Partner program and their accounts will be restricted.
partnership.title15: What can you offer if I want to partner with RSkins?
partnership.content15: We will be glad to discuss our cooperation. <Link>Apply for a partnership</Link>

contact.title: Contacts
contact.content1: Interested in partnering with us? We welcome your inquiries. Please reach out to us via email at {{email}} for further information and discussions. If you are an influencer, please include a personal introduction, your website ID, and personal contact information. We will contact you during CET (Central European Time).
contact.content2: Have any questions or need assistance? Our customer support team is here to help. Please include a personal introduction, your website ID, and personal contact information. Feel free to reach out to us at {{email}}, and we'll be happy to assist you.
contact.address: Company number HE 452815, Spyrou Kyprianou, 20 CHAPO CENTRAL, Flat/Office 201 1075, Nicosia, Cyprus
